summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Housing and Building Maintenance Code, adding "premises" to the list of property that the City can declare unfit and for which the City can order abatement of conditions, impose liens, and impose penalties; and amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 22.208.010, 22.208.020, 22.208.030, 22.208.040, 22.208.080, 22.208.090, 22.208.100, 22.208.110, and 22.208.120.
